duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage new installation projects to ensure projects close-out at the required efficiency and profitability levels.
Review and book projects, coordinate with vendors, and ensure timely delivery of project materials.
Interface with the Field Superintendent to track job progress and seek change notice opportunities.
Accurately track and manage all allowances built into project costs to ensure financial job profitability.
Participate in Company professional development programs to enhance working knowledge of Elevator Company products, services, and procedures.

education_certification.credential: BS/AS degree in Engineering, Architecture, Construction Management, Project Management or Finance with prior project management experience
